name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Abloom for Staff: AI Powered Wellbeing

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Abloom browser extension for staff - harnessing the power of AI to foster a deep understanding of emotional wellbeing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Abloom uses AI to strengthen trust and support between students and school leaders.
